babushka.description: Lucie's mom, Francoise, a.k.a. Baboushka, is visiting us for two whole weeks.
babushka.title: Babushka

boys_nana.description: Dean's mom, Harriet, a.k.a. Nana, joined us for a couple of days. It was a two-grandma-Christmas!
boys_nana.title: Boys Nana

caroling.description:
On December 23, we got a group of friends and neighbors together and went Christmas caroling. It was a lot of fun!

Caroling consists of singing Christmas songs at the doorsteps of random neighbors. It is done all across America.
caroling.title: Caroling

lights01.description:
On December 24th, we partook in another neighborly Christmas tradition. The Luminaria Walk, as it is called, is unique to our neighborhood: the streets are lit with votive candles in paper bags.

The purpose of all this is to light the way for Santa Claus.
lights01.title: Lights 1

lights02.description: Lucie's job was to put a little sand in each bag, so it wouldn't fly away. We borrowed the sand from Totland. Felix's job is to haul the wagon.
lights02.title: Lights 2

lights03.description: We discovered the Luminaria Walk last year, and vowed to be part of it this year. We didn't know how to participate, but Nana met a friendly neighbor the day of the event, who set us up with properly-folded bags, a starter set of candles, and the basic intructions. Nana bought some more candles, and we had enough to pave 2 blocks. Yeah Nana!
lights03.title: Lights 3

lights04.description: Milo's job was to amuse the troops.
lights04.title: Lights 4

lights05.description: You can't tell from this picture, but Milo was a grumpy snotty mess this Christmas. We suspect he had a sinus infection. 'tis the season.
lights05.title: Lights 5

lights06.description: Wait up, Nana! I want to help you space the paper bags!
lights06.title: Lights 6

lights08.description: At sundown, the candles get lit. We were disappointed to find that someone else had already lit the candles in our bags, but a good samaritan let us lit some of his candles.
lights08.title: Lights 8

lights09.description: Felix loved the pomp and circumstance.
lights09.title: Lights 9

lights10.description: We walked around for quite a while, and found that most of the streets in our neighborhood were lit, on about a 20 block area. It had grown bigger since last year. It started 10 years ago, on just 1 block.
lights10.title: Lights 10

xmas01.description: Christmas morning! We woke up to Felix jumping on our bed, telling us in a very very very excited voice that Santa had come, eaten up his cookies, and left a ton of presents.
xmas01.title: Xmas 1

xmas02.description: Milo wanted to open everyone's presents.
xmas02.title: Xmas 2

xmas03.description: Baboushka got glass bells from Nana. They chime delightfully.
xmas03.title: Xmas 3

xmas04.description: Hey, Nana, what did YOU get?
xmas04.title: Xmas 4

xmas05.description: Felix's favorite present is this super-cool Super Fort from Granny. It's very easy to assemble and has endless configurations.
xmas05.title: Xmas 5

xmas06.description: Milo's favorite present is a set of Incredibles figurines from Papa John and Linda.
xmas06.title: Xmas 6

xmas07.description: Lucie's favorite present was pee from Milo. For the first time ever, on Christmas morning, he lowered his pajamas all by himself and used the potty, unprompted. He had used the potty many times before, but only if he was butt-naked to start with.
xmas07.title: Xmas 7

xmas08.description: Santa brought Felix a very stable scooter. He is talking about using it to go to school in the mornings.
xmas08.title: Xmas 8

xmas09.description: In the last month, Milo asks to have the same books read to him at least twice in a row, more times if we can stomach it.  This seems to be caused by a desire to start reading.
xmas09.title: Xmas 9

xmas_eve.description: The last thing Felix did on Christmas eve: set a glass of milk and a plate of cookies for Santa Claus. He was very concerned about the fire in the fireplace, but Dean reassured him that he would make sure the fire was out later in the night, so that Santa wouldn't burn his buns.
xmas_eve.title: Xmas Eve

zee_family1.description: You better believe it! The four of us on the same photo!
zee_family1.title: Zee Family 1

description:
Merry Christmas! This year was a Christmas rich in family (two grandmas!) and neighborly traditions.

The kids are out of school for 2 weeks. Lucie is taking advantage of the break to potty train Milo. He was doing well last summer when the weather was warm enough to stroll the house naked, but never got the hang of wearing underwear. This Friday, the diaper came off. After a day of many accidents, a bribe was introduced: 3 M&M's for each potty use. Milo peed in the potty within 10 minutes. He is getting a little better every day, and always rushes proudly to get his yummy reward.
title: December 25
